name: SparkPage
tag_list: mobile, mobile-marketing, sms, conversion, roi, social-media-conversion, web-analytics, analytics-conversion, landing-page-optimization, lead-generation, conversion-rate-improvement, a-b-testing, inbound-marketing, internet-marketing, conversion-marketing
overview:
SparkPage lets marketers, agencies and brands create and publish mobile-optimized landing pages with no coding required.

Mobile landing pages can be used in PPC, display advertising, SMS, QR code and any other mobile marketing campaign.

The SparkPage platform provides a full suite of analytics tools to measure campaign performance.

It also provides one-click A/B testing to let marketers fully optimize their campaigns with no expensive tech requirements.

The SparkPage platform has pre-made templates and Calls to Action designed to optimize mobile conversions.
